name: Elmo Solutions
description:
Since the advent of Computer-Aided Design (CAD), manufacturing companies using CAD and PLM software as well as ERP and MRP systems have made a tremendous investment in the creation and maintenance of data (graphic, or geometric, information) and metadata (non-geometric objects).

Too often, however, the greater part of this investment is lost, mainly because of theERP CAD Data Integration absence of adequate and efficient tools to get the most out of metadata imprisoned in technical documents.  That's where the Elmo Series of PLM/CAD/PDM and ERP/MRP/CRM data integration solutions comes in, empowering real people with the capability to harvest and harness otherwise unusable metadata.
Our flagship solution, Agni Link, is the most advanced CAD-ERP data integration solution currently available.  It is an add-in to CAD/PDM solutions such as SolidWorks, Autodesk Inventor and AutoCAD (most vertical "flavors" are supported) that allows bidirectional integration with a wide range ERP/MRP applications.  Its live, interactive integration process ensures that CAD data has been properly validated prior to updating the ERP database, thus ensuring absolute integrity of both CAD and ERP data "silos" at all times.
